entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 5 cm except rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
